title: Inspector Ji’s Ridiculous Conjectures 1 - Novel Updates
tags: Comedic Undertone   Detectives   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Murders   Police
author: 亮亮
description:
'The murderer died before killing anybody! You've got to uncover the truth!'

'The robber not only took money from the bank but my accomplice too!'

'I've kidnapped a rich man's son but I can only ask for 30 grand?! What lousy deal is this?!'

'Who on earth meddled with my airbag?! I nearly died in that car accident!'

'Only a swindler would know the secret behind this transaction, so you'd better call the police now!'

'This is my last gig as a murderer, so pleeeaaase don't screw up!'

It's the most unfortunate of criminals vs the most egomaniacal police inspector in the history of mankind - this comedy of errors just keeps replaying itself.>
